🎁‍🎄Office Chairs for Heavy People: Our high back office chair has a heavy-duty swivel metal base, SGS Class 3-cylinder, sturdy rubber wheels, designed for tall and heavy people, maximum can support 400 pounds (Recommended weight 175-250 pounds). Big and tall office chair 400lbs wide seat with extra-large seat cushion and back support gently wraps your body and support your neck and spine, intimate the design allows you to stay comfortable while working, studying, or playing for long hours. (Seat size: 20.5D" X 23.6W", 6.7" thick, backrest size: 29.1L" X 21.3W", 4" thick)

🎁‍🎄Comfortable Office Chair: The executive office chair is equipped with a highly elastic built-in spring package of the cushion, comfortable and non-deforming, headrest, and backrest filled with high-quality sponge, soft and comfortable. The armrests is wraped soft padded, very soft and can be adjusted for flip-up that bend when you don't need them, allowing for greater freedom of movement. Designed with ergonomic high back perfect match for your gaming table & computer desk.

🎁‍🎄Multi-Functional Office Chair: Big and tall office chair 400lbs wide seat for heavy people has 360-degree swivel rolling, 4" height adjustment function, backrest angle adjustable function, customize your best sitting position, so you can enjoy the most comfortable sitting position. This executive office chair brings the most comfortable enjoyment for your life and work.

🎁‍🎄Wildely Used in Home or Office: Our luxury executive office chair adds a touch of modern style to your work and life environment. Featuring a sleek, stylish design that blends perfectly with any home or office space, it is the ideal office desk chair, boss chair, high back leather office chair, home office desk chairs for boys, girls, teens, adults, boss and manager.

🎁‍🎄EASY INSTALLATION: Supplied with all hardware and necessary tools, this home office desk chairs can be easily and quickly assembled according to the instructions on the package. The entire installation process can be completed in just 10-15 minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Executive Office Chair, Sucrever Big and Tall Office Chair, Office Chairs for Heavy People, High Back Office Chair, Office Desk Chair, Grey+Blue Why Choose Sucrever Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Wide Seat, Leather Office Chair, Office Chair Lumbar Support? GOOD GIFTS FOR THE FOLLOWING HOLIDAY: CHRISTMAS DAY OR BIRTHDAY FOR YOUR BOYS TEENS ADULTS BOSS This big and tall office chair 400lbs wide seat is designed to accommodate the needs of larger individuals and provide them with all the comfort they need. It is a executive office chair with a generously-sized, breathable seat cushion with elastic spring pack, and adjustable height and rock back and forth function that enable easy customization for both big and tall users.All the office chairs for heavy people from Sucrever has passed the test of standard which has a 400lbs weight capacity, fits adults and teenagers. Strong metal base and 360-degree swivel nylon rolling casters that make it incredibly easy to move around, noise-free, and floor-friendly.

Executive Office Chair, Your Best Choice For Home and Office Occasions Office Desk Chair Specification Office Chairs for Heavy People Color: Brown/Blue+Grey Materials: Breathable Leather+Metal+Spring+Sponge Package Included: 1pcs Office Chair Load Capacity: About 400lbs Overall Size: 24.4"L*20.5"W*44.9-48"H Ergonomic Executive Office Chair Blue Office Chair Premium Leather, Nice Appearance Our executive office chair is made with premium breathable leather that is waterproof and stain-resistant, easy to wipe clean. The PU leather home office desk chairs has a breathable hole at the back and seat, allow air circulation to provide all-day comfort. Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs Wide Seat Gorgeous Style, Comfy Office Chair The executive office chair is equipped with all parts and necessary installation tools. Follow the instructions provided and you will find that it is easy to assemble.

Spring Back+Thickend Board The comfortable executive office chair contains spring packs and thickned board to ensure softness and elasticity without causing the seat cushion to collapse. High Density Foam The first layer is a soft sponge, which makes executive office chair softer and more comfortable. The second layer is the new foam, which allows the seat cushion to remain in a dent-free state for a longer period of time. Premium Leather Our big and tall office chair 400lbs wide seat breathable leather has better air permeability than ordinary PU (Artificial leather) in the air permeability test. Good air permeability means a more comfortable seating experience. This office desk chair reduces stuffy and sweats of your back and waist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good office chair
reviews.reviewText: Very well designed and manufactured office chair with nice easy adjustments and easy to clean. Better design and durability than many other far more expensive office chairs. Big soft but supportive seat with spring loaded lumbar support adjustable height and adjustable rocking action option, and up or down arm rests . 400 pounds maximum capable which is extremely good for bigger people! This chair has it all! Assembled easily in 10 minutes maximum!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The delivery was fast. Assembling was easy for me with all the tools and parts included in the package. The chair is very comfy and tall enough to rest my head (I'm 6ft). The metal base looks very sturdy. The leather feels nice and soft. Height adjust works smoothly, armrests can also be adjusted and lifted all the way up to give you extra space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a pretty nice chair
reviews.reviewText: I got this because I do a lot of writing on my laptop, and I've really been needing a comfortable place to write. Sitting on the couch with the laptop on my lap or the coffee table is just stupid. So I got rid of the stupid couch and the stupid coffee table, and built a desk and bought this desk chair. So far, it's perfect for the purpose. It looks nice, the back support and overall comfort is really good. The leather feels like quality, and it looks good as well. It's not an Eames chair, but it probably works better than one for what I need.Not five stars because the casters are cheap. I already had a crappy desk chair I tried to make better with nice casters, so I just transferred those over. It would also be nice if the arms had more adjustment than just up or down. Different "down" positions would be nice, but for the price it's fine. The rocking function is good as well.I'm 6'2", and generally have problems with chairs too low to the ground. This one has a very comfortable height. The back and arms and seat dimensions and all that are just right; after having a few cheap chairs, this is legitimately nice. The packaging was good too - not excessive, but enough. And the assembly was pretty straightforward. I found the instruction sheet when I was almost done, but it was no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The chair is made of beautiful leather with high density foam. The only issue I had was putting it together. The foam was so dense it was a little difficult to line the arms up with the seat and the back. Once the seat was attached you really have to push the back into aligning the holes, because the foam is so dense. You’ll need to leave the screws loose until everything is attached . Then go back and tighten everything. I put it together myself, but would recommend a second person.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Constantly Have to Adjust
reviews.reviewText: I have to give a one star as the chair does not stay at the adjusted height. It keeps sinking/lowering by 2 inches or so, so I am no longer level with my desk. I am well below the weight requirement of the chair. I can't locate a fix and having to readjust every few minutes is tiring and frustrating, At this time, I don't recommend this chair. Very unfortunate, as the chair does seem comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two of the rascall's
reviews.reviewText: My wife really needed a new office chair. Mine is also starting to show it's age. This was a good value for two.The chairs are quality. Steel welded wheel base. Nice casters. Side frames are heavy aluminum castings nicely finished. The problem with most office chairs are the coverings. Unless you spend above $xxxxx.xx you would be lucky to get one with upholstery that last more than 5yrs. My current chair is a fairly expensive LZBY and it is around 6 yrs old. The fabric on these is fair and probably will be the weak point. But for the price it is a fair trade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair was purchased to replaced the old one in my husband’s office which was peeling off. I am more than happy with the quality and comfort it brings. It was easy to assemble and so great to use. I sat in the chair for hours and no back discomfort at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but NOT breathable
reviews.reviewText: I will say that comfort wise, this chair is nice, but there are two main flaws and one is a big one for me.The first is the legs. The legs are metal, and the shape of them makes it inevitable that you're going to kick them while sitting with the back of your foot, and it hurts!The second, which is really a deal breaker for me, is the breathability. It's not there. This chair will make me sweat in a matter of minutes and there is no way to stop it. My fault for not thinking a fake leather chair would do that, but it's absolutely horrible. I need this chair for work which means sitting for 8-9 hours. Now I just spent a large amount on this chair and I'm likely going to need another because I just can't work while sitting in a puddle of sweat. If it wasn't so difficult to do so, I would have sent this chair back.
